item.title: How to Build a Blog Like This: Deploy
item.description:
This is the third post of a series, you might want to check the previous articles: (Intro and Content) before reading this.

Since we only have static files, we only need a simple web server to serve the site. It can be self-hosted or hosted on a cheap Webhosting solution and there are other cool options, like:

  • GitHub Pages
  • GitLab Pages
  • Amazon S3
  • Azure Storage
  • Google Cloud Storage
  • Netlify
  • Firebase
